title: Abnormal Condition

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Inflict disease on two players. This gives them Cold, or moves them to the next stage if they are already diseased.
> Cold: Their defence is set to vulnerable.
> Fever: They cannot vote.
> Hell: They will be dealt a basic attack at the end of the next night.
> Heaven: They gain invincible defence, and become fully death immune.
> Seizure: All defence is removed, and they are dealt an unstoppable attack.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Diseases only come into effect after they are applied.
- At the end of every night, there's a 40% chance that diseased players will move onto the next stage without your involvement.
- You always know which players are diseased and what stage they are at.
- When you die, all diseases remain, and the chance of naturally progressing is increased to 75%.
- With the Necronomicon, using your ability on an undiseased player will move them immediately to Hell instead of Cold.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Make the other players forgive to the Coven.
